title: What font is this?!
content:
The green titles, such as, “Simply the Fastest,”Real-World Gaming Effects,” etc.

[http://www.nvidia.com/object/geforce\_gtx\_gts\_m\_series.html#/features/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101815/http:/www.nvidia.com/object/geforce_gtx_gts_m_series.html#/features/ "http://www.nvidia.com/object/geforce\_gtx\_gts\_m\_series.html#/features/")

THANKS!
author: Ninth Kingdom

comments.content: depending on your system and browser settings, you may be seeing something other than Trebuchet. if need be, post a screenhot, and we’ll tell you.
